    • Class jep.Category extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • name
          java.lang.String name
        • questionSet
          jep.Question[] questionSet
          instance variables - Question object array 'questionSet' contains all the category names. The String variable, 'name' sets the name of each question in 'questionSet'

    • Class jep.DefaultPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • aP
          jep.AnswerPanel aP
          QuestionListPanel qListP the QuestionListPanel, the reference is used as a shortcut because time is wasted looking through the array and casting otherwise
        • cards
          java.awt.CardLayout cards
          CardLayout cards the CardLayout which is the layout used to manage which panel is displayede
        • PANELS
          javax.swing.JPanel[] PANELS
          'PANELS' is of JPanel type, and it holds all the panels for the main screen layout of the app, essentially all Panels are static and could therefore be serialized if we wanted.
        • qListP
          jep.QuestionListPanel qListP
          QuestionListPanel qListP the QuestionListPanel, the reference is used as a shortcut because time is wasted looking through the array and casting otherwise
        • qP
          QuestionPanel qP
          QuestionPanel qP the QuestionPanel, the reference is used as a shortcut because time is wasted looking through the array and casting otherwise
        • storeFile
          java.io.File storeFile
          File storeFile the file that is being played
